43 void state_callback (const std_msgs::String::ConstPtr& msg)
44 {
45  // enable collision avoidance by default
46  active = true;
47 
48  // check each part of the behavior state path (for nested states)
49  string path = msg->data;
50  size_t pos = 0;
51  while ((pos = path.find("/")) != string::npos) {
52  if (pos > 0) {
53  // disable collision avoidance if behavior state is in the excluded list
54  if (find(excluded.begin(), excluded.end(), path.substr(0, pos)) != excluded.end()) {
55  active = false;
56  ROS_DEBUG("In state %s, disable collision avoidance", msg->data.c_str());
57  }
58  }
59  path.erase(0, pos + 1);
60  }
61  // disable collision avoidance if behavior state is in the excluded list
62  if (find(excluded.begin(), excluded.end(), path) != excluded.end()) {
63  active = false;
64  ROS_DEBUG("In state %s, disable collision avoidance", msg->data.c_str());
65  }
66 
67  if (active)
68  ROS_DEBUG("In state %s, enable collision avoidance", msg->data.c_str());
69 }
70 
77 int main (int argc, char **argv)
78 {
79  // init ros node
80  init(argc, argv, "collision_avoidance");
81  NodeHandle nh;
82 
83  // don't perform collision avoidance initially
84  active = false;
85 
86  // read parameters
87  double loop_rate;
88  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 1.5);
89  int queue_size;
90  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
91  bool visualize;
92  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/visualize", visualize, false);
93  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/excluded", excluded);
94 
95  // initialize repulsion
96  double dist_critical;
97  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/dist_critical", dist_critical, 3.0);
98  double dist_attract;
99  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/dist_attract", dist_attract, 6.0);
100  double dist_repulse;
101  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/dist_repulse", dist_repulse, 12.0);
102  string attraction_shape;
103  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/attraction_shape", attraction_shape, attraction_shape);
104  string repulsion_shape;
105  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/repulsion_shape", repulsion_shape, repulsion_shape);
106 
107  ca.init(dist_critical, dist_attract, dist_repulse, attraction_shape, repulsion_shape);
108 
109  // ros communication
110  Subscriber sp_pos_sub = nh.subscribe("pos_controller/goal_position", queue_size, sp_pos_cb);
111  Subscriber sp_vel_sub = nh.subscribe("vel_controller/target_velocity", queue_size, sp_vel_cb);
112  Subscriber pos_sub = nh.subscribe("pos_provider/pose", queue_size, pos_cb);
113  Subscriber swarm_sub = nh.subscribe("swarm_position_rel", queue_size, swarm_cb);
114  Subscriber state_sub = nh.subscribe("flexbe/behavior_update", queue_size, state_callback);
115  Publisher pos_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("pos_controller/ca_goal_position", queue_size, true);
116  Publisher vel_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("vel_controller/ca_target_velocity", queue_size, true);
117  Publisher vis_pub;
118  if (visualize)
119  vis_pub = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("collision_avoidance/direction", queue_size, true);
120 
121  // init loop rate
122  Rate rate(loop_rate);
123 
124  ROS_DEBUG("Collision avoidance ready");
125 
126  // perform collision avoidance
127  while (ok()) {
128  // get updated information
129  spinOnce();
130 
131  // only perform collision avoidance in desired behavior states
132  if (active) {
133  // calculate avoidance position / velocity
134  bool avoid = ca.calc();
135 
136  // perform collision avoidance if necessary
137  if (avoid) {
138  // using position setpoint
139  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos = ca.get_pos();
140  pos.header.stamp = Time::now();
141  if (ca.sp_pos()) {
142  pos_pub.publish(pos);
143  }
144 
145  // using velocity setpoint
146  else if (ca.sp_vel()) {
147  geometry_msgs::Twist vel = ca.get_vel();
148  // vel.header.stamp TODO
149  vel_pub.publish(vel);
150  }
151 
152  else {
153  ROS_ERROR_THROTTLE(10, "Unknown setpoint, cannot perform collision avoidance!");
154  }
155 
156  // visualization
157  if (visualize) {
158  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
159  dir = pos;
160  tf2::Quaternion orientation;
161  orientation.setRPY(0, 0, atan2(ca.get_dir().y, ca.get_dir().x));
162  dir.pose.orientation = tf2::toMsg(orientation);
163  vis_pub.publish(dir);
164  }
165  }
166  }
167 
168  rate.sleep();
169  }
170 
171  return 0;
172 }
